data.title: Really great quality and long lasting
data.body: I have had zero issues with this one and have been using it for two months now. Charges fast and magsafe works great!

data.title: Strong
data.body: We got new phones that won’t charge with the normal wireless chargers, so I was on the hunt! I chose this one because it had a power block and I don’t have any USB-C power blocks. It works great. Charges my iPhone 15 and the magnet is strong. I also love the color!!

data.title: Worth the buy
data.body: It’s pretty solid an excellent charger but if you plan on using it while playing games especially high performance games like codm it gets very hot

data.title: Very convenient
data.body: Works good

data.title: Effective and appears to be battery safe
data.body:
I upgraded to the iPhone 15 this year (from an XR that still had its original battery - although it did need replacing which was part of why I upgraded now - so you know I protect my investments and do everything I can to extend their lifespan).

Anywho, I wanted to take advantage of the magnetic charging which was a new feature to me. Even though this isn’t technically MagSafe, as far as I can tell, it respects the battery settings on my iPhone and will hold it at 80%, even overnight.

To my surprise, I have other chargers that do not respect it and will push past it to charge to 100%. I’m not sure how those are able to do it. But I’m watching all my chargers and replacing ones that don’t seem long-term battery protective.

I’m keeping this one and will probably get another in a different color.

One of the reasons I went with the 15 instead of the 14 (which is otherwise very similar to 15 in specs) was the usb-c charger. I was ready to be done with lightning but still have iPods. Since this will charge my iPods as well, it is the last thing I needed to free me from lightning cables forever.

FREEDOM! Feel the freedom!!!

So yes, I’m super happy with this purchase and would highly recommend.

data.title: Excellent charger
data.body: I have an iPhone 12 Max Pro that has been having trouble charging with a wired charger. A friend suggested I try a wireless charger and I'm glad I did! This wireless charger starts working as soon as I connect the magnet. I have also noticed that my battery seems to be lasting longer than before too. I have read other reviews that the wireless charger gets too hot, but so far I have not experienced any heat issues. I do not use my phone while it is charging. My only gripe is I notice that my phone does not charge as fast with the wireless charger compared to a wired one, it took over an hour to fully charge when my phone was at 35%. But still overall I am happy with the purchase. Will be buying a 2nd one to keep as an extra when traveling.

data.title: Love this item!
data.body: It is a great value for the cost and works really great. There is almost always a phone attached to it. I am planning on ordering a second one!

data.title: Fast charging, just a little bulky
data.body:
Works as described and charges my phone as quickly as any MagSafe charger I've used. I chose this option because it comes with the power adapter, which makes it good value for the price. The charger gets warm with use but not hot enough for it to be a concern.

The only drawbacks of this specific charger are the thickness and magnet strength. This charger is quite a bit thicker than my other MagSafe charger, which makes it a bit awkward to hold while charging. The charger stays in place decently well, but does not connect as strongly to my phone as other ones. I don't find it to be that big of an issue, but the charger will definitely come off if your phone falls to the floor, for example.

Overall I am happy with this charger for the price. I wouldn't recommend it for use on the go, but it serves me well as a bedside charger.

data.title: Great charger, just one bug
data.body:
This works great, charges quickly and easily. The main thing I didn't like is that you can't use a different A/C adapter with it. The one included is fairly sizeable, so I have some difficulty fitting it on my work power strip. It would be nice if the cord was just a little longer, but that's not enough to ding it in my opinion.

I've used both of these for several months now and still love them.

data.title: 10w For Fast Charging Feature seemingly performs better than many 18w+
data.body: 10w For Fast Charging Feature seemingly performs better than many 18w+ fast charging feature with wireless chargers and I have used the past. I am currently using/testing this product. Thus Far I can say that my battery seems to be charging and rate from 15% to 29% within half hour. My only negative so far would be that the charger as my iPhone are warm. at this point the temperature increase is not at a level of concern. Just something to note when charging your device, the phone or the device charging your phone tends to get warm which is normal.

data.title: One of my best purchases so far
data.body: I love this thing, combined with my MagSafe case, this works wonders for just quickly placing my phone beside my bed and charging it without the need to really do any effort. I hate connecting the normal charger on my Iphone because overtime it can create dust in the charging hole, and this fixes that in its' full capacity

data.body:
It's so nice to not plug in my phone overnight with a Lightning connector, especially since I tend to get lint in my phone's port since it's always in my pants pocket.

I wish there wasn't such a loud beep from the phone when I connected, but AFAIK that's the phone, not the charger.

Play Video

Another bonus was that it came with the charging box (C port) and I can use the box to connect my Apple Watch charger and charge my watch 🤗

data.body: I highly recommend this charger! You won’t regret your purchase. It works perfectly and the cord is longer than other charges I have purchased in the past.

data.title: Sort of works
data.body: Ordered this because it claims quick charging, magnetic, compatible. Very sensitive to placement wrt to the phone. It shows quick charging, but that only lasts a few seconds. Other wireless chargers work with the case on, but I took it off just to try. No difference. The phone actually discharged while connected. I was going to return it, but I'll hang onto it to try on other phones. Besides, the power supply actually works well direct connected to the phone with a good USB C cable. I'll keep it just for that.

data.title: Charges well with slight caveats
data.body:
I have been using this to charge my 14 pro max for a couple months now and it definitely charges relatively quickly. The only issue about it is that as other's have stated form time to time, for what ever odd ball reason, it heats up even when not charging.

The other thing is, and this is another strange thing, usually when I plug my 14 pro max into it, it shows the charge ring on the phone, but once in a while I hear the connection sound, indicating it is charging BUT no charge ring.

However when I take the iphone off the charger and unplug the charger from the wall outlet then back in, it somehow shows the charge ring again. Sometimes I even have to do that alongside restarting my iphone.

That seems to only happen with this charger, which overall. am fairly happy with.

data.title: iPhone 12 charger
data.body: I always was losing my charger. I saw this on Amazon a decided to buy it. When I got it I plugged it in an have kept it there ever since. Fastest charger an it grabs my phone onto the magnet a charges it fast. I have a few friends who have ordered them one too because they had used mine. It’s the only charger I’d use as long as it fits my phone. Easy to use an even little children can us it. Fast an convenient. I remind this charger to anyone who wants fast charge.
